name: Escaping from Home
description:
in Escaping from Home you're a small vegan spider that lives in a tabern. But the owner finds about your presence and sprays arachnicide all over the floor!, Shoot spider webs to balance around and grab the fruits you have around your home before you escape.

The tutorials are in spanish, but the only thing you need to know is that you can shoot webs with your triggers and open a menu with the X button from the oculus quest 2 controller.

Any feedback will be appreciated as this is a project for a university signature.
